tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  TOUGH GRADER  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Cons: Very difficult class with a lot of assignments. Grades extremely hard. Lots of homework. Pros: VERY sweet lady. Will help whenever you ask for it. Will listen to your concerns. Is open. Provides chance to get the CHIA certification (great opportunity for HBM!) Friendly

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Christina is very helpful and will almost do the assignment for you if you ask, but if you don\'t ask, you will struggle. She is hard to understand, but if you make note of the things she mentions multiple times, 9 out of 10, it will be on the exam. She is one of the better professors in the hospitality department, but the subject matter is hard.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Very boring class with a terrible teacher. HW every single day.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Difficult to understand. "franchise" sounds remarkably like "french fries". the class is dry and Chi can be monotone at times. Do NOT waste $$ on the book. The class is based mostly off of powerpoint and a few hw problems come from the book. Stay focused during class and you\'ll do fine.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Please do yourself a favor and save yourself from hours of extreme boredom. Very hard to understand and she has very poor listening skills. Material is hard to understand.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: So boring and dry, attendance is required

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Hard to understand sometimes due to Chinese accent, can be monotone and boring at times. Class is based on powerpoints don.t waste money on the book. Otherwise she is a very nice person who will try to get to know you and is willing to help in any way she can. Keep yourself focused in the class and you will do well.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Sometimes difficult understand her accent. Her tests are worded confusingly. In class she just talks and talks about the slides, and it gets hard to focus.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Easiest class I\'ve ever taken. Tests straight of powerpoint lecture slides.Study the night before test briefly and you will have no problem getting A\'s. One group project during the semester. Points for attendance. Sometimes her accent makes it hard to understand what she\'s saying

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  Caring (1)
comments: Easy class. Tests are straight off of notes. Dont really need to go to class. Just study a little bit and you will be fine.
